name: Mejor Amigo Pet Supply:** This is a Latina-owned pet supplies brand that emphasizes culture in its products. It is unclear if they have a physical store location in Minnesota or if they operate online only.
The following are general pet supply stores in Minnesota that received positive mentions:
Urban Tails Pet Supply:** Located in Minneapolis, this store is known for its high-quality, all-natural products and knowledgeable staff.
Pet Supplies Plus (Minneapolis, MN #0199):** This is a locally owned and operated store in Minneapolis, with a team experienced with pets. They offer delivery and various services.
Mondo's PET DEPOT:** This store offers a wide range of premium pet food, supplies, and grooming services. They state their staff can help solve basic animal care problems.
Atlas Pet Supply:** A family-owned business since 1990, Atlas Pet Supply offers a wide variety of quality pet supplies and is praised for its customer service and friendly staff.
My Pets Plus:** Serving Bemidji, Minnesota, this store focuses on top-quality pet food and supplies, including their own brand, North Winds Premium.
Pet Wants Minneapolis:** This business offers fresh, local, and natural pet food and products, with delivery and shipping options available.
address: It is possible that some of these stores may have Spanish-speaking employees. For specific information regarding language services, it would be best to contact the stores directly.
